item.title: Post: Go back to bed
item.description: Woke up with the terrible idea of rewriting WebMake as a card/Gatsby plugin but: I don’t even know who would know what I’m talking about I don’t know how to do that I’m just not sure how well this plan was thought through.
item.content:encoded:
Woke up with the terrible idea of rewriting WebMake as a card/Gatsby plugin but:

  • I don’t even know who would know what I’m talking about
  • I don’t know how to do that
  • I’m just not sure how well this plan was thought through.
